data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate – Daemonhunters Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Transport yourself to the Warhammer 40,000 universe with the epic tracks (plus one bonus track) from the game. Brought to you by famed composer Doyle W. Donehoo.
data.about_the_game: Transport yourself to the Warhammer 40,000 universe with the epic tracks (plus one bonus track) from the game. Brought to you by famed composer Doyle W. Donehoo.
data.short_description: Transport yourself to the Warhammer 40,000 universe with the epic tracks (plus one bonus track) from the game. Brought to you by famed composer Doyle W. Donehoo.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 400 MB available space
